name: Chapter I
tooltip:
Chapter I

Bring pages 1, 4, 6, and 8 of Nesingwary's The Green Hills of Stranglethorn to Barnil Stonepot in order to complete Chapter I.

Requirements:
- Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Page 1
- Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Page 4
- Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Page 6
- Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Page 8
